message: Wait--so everyone is freaking out and bashing Walmart because of a RUMOR? Are you serious right now? Are we in high school? Or has this actually become middle school? this is THE WORST bunch of cry babies I've ever seen. First of all- Walmart doesn't close a store because of a rumor (this is not responsible news reporting so lets make this news source know that). Second-- if that store is MAKING MONEY they also won't close a store. How many walmarts across this nation are dry and they still make money. (Let me answer that for you HUNDREDS.) So before you start bashing a retailer that brings more revenue and jobs than most other retailers in that community id say you are a bunch of ungrateful residence. Do your research and stop believing everything you read on the Internet. ðŸ„

I'm not as avid a gamer as some, but I've found that some games are stunning in their creativity and content. Check out """"The Unfinished Swan"""". The music is beautiful, the game play is different, and the story is rather simple and poignant. I think video games are mediums that blend visuals, sounds, etc together in an attempt to tell a story. Imo, that is art: telling a story. Does that mean Call of Duty is art? Well, that's subjective, correct?
So rad! Sharing. Thanks for the find!
